name: Dohrnii
description: Dohrnii is a cryptocurrency education platform that provides structured courses on topics including blockchain technology, trading strategies, risk management, and decentralized finance (DeFi). The Dohrnii Academy offers a learning system where users can complete lessons, quizzes, and challenges. The platform incorporates a Learn-to-Earn model, in which participants receive $DHN tokens upon completing educational activities. Designed for both beginners and experienced traders, Dohrnii aims to make cryptocurrency-related knowledge more accessible. The platform features a user interface and an updated curriculum intended to provide users with information relevant to the evolving crypto market.
